ModMetaData.name: Research Reinvented
ModMetaData.author: PeteTimesSix
ModMetaData.description: What if inventing thing was not as simple as just thinking about the idea real hard for a few weeks? You might figure out how to make pemmican by analysing various ingredients for their nutritional content or experimenting at a campfire. Learning how to sew clothing for nobility might be easier if you already have some noble clothing at hand to take inspiration from. Once you have a basic idea of how to construct electrical generators, you might attempt to build a prototype. And hey, if you want to invent television, maybe you can learn something from all those broken down screens in those ancient vaults? More to come ...?
